body_html:
Nope, there's no distributed support in Eager. So if you want to large scale implementation, you'll need to use classic execution mode.

There used to be l-BFGS implemented in standard TensorFlow but it was deleted because it never got robust enough. Because tensorflow distributed framework is quite low-level so people sometimes get surprised by how much work it takes to get something robust. Following comment/commits in sync_replicas_optimizer gives an overview of some pitfalls -- https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/training/sync_replicas_optimizer.py
